about_the_game:
Get equipped with MEGA tunes, featuring all the classic 8-bit Mega Man 3 music composed by Yasuaki Fujita and Harumi Fujita, plus the additional 32-bit era arrangements!

The soundtrack has been reauthored from the original, high quality source material. Formats include MP3 (V0), FLAC (16-bit), and AAC (VBR).
